naslov: Sesvete - dvoetažna kuća (235 m2) + PARKING + TERASA + BALKON (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Agencija Zagreb4U predstavlja dvoetažnu kuću (235 m2) s okućnicom (780 m2) u Sesvetama. U kući se nalaze dva odvojena stana na dvije etaže. Ulazi u stanove su odvojeni i u njih se ulazi kroz zajednički haustor i stubište. VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/3791/ LOKACIJA: Sesvete su jedno od najistočnijih naselja u Zagrebu, smješteno na granici između grada i ruralnih područja. Kvart se ističe raznolikošću — od urbaniziranih dijelova s modernim stambenim zgradama i trgovačkim centrima do mirnijih, tradicionalnih sela i prirodnih krajolika. Unatoč brzom razvoju, Sesvete su zadržale šarm prigradskog naselja, čineći ih privlačnima za obitelji, mlade ljude i one koji traže miran, ali praktičan životni prostor. Kvart ima razvijenu infrastrukturu s brojnim školama, vrtićima, sportskim centrima i kulturnim sadržajima poput Muzeja Prigorja. Prometno su vrlo dobro povezane s ostatkom Zagreba, posebno vlakovima i autobusima, što ga čini atraktivnim za ljude koji traže povoljniji životni prostor izvan užeg gradskog središta. KUĆA SE SASTOJI OD: - PRIZEMLJA: 4 spavaće sobe, velikog dnevnog boravka, blagovaonice, kuhinje, male blagovanice, garderobe, 2 kupaonice s WC-ima i tuševima i jednog dodatnog WC-a, balkona, terase i izlaza na dvorište - 1. KATA: 2 spavaće sobe, velikog boravka, blagovanice, kuhinje, garderobe, jedne kupaonice s WC-om i kadom, jednog dodatnog WC-a i velike terase. Na raspolaganju su još i: vanjski zidani natkriveni roštilj, zatvoreno vrtno spremište i otvorena nadstrešnica. NAMJEŠTAJ I OPREMA: kuća je djelomično namještena, ali ju je moguće namjestiti prema potrebama najmoprimaca. Uređaji koji se u njoj nalaze: ploča za kuhanje, pećnica, hladnjak, perilica posuđa i perilica rublja. KUĆA JE NAMIJENJENA ZA: tvrtke ili agencije za zapošljavanje radnika. Moguće je iznajmljivanje i privatnim osobama. PARKING: uz kuću dolazi vanjsko nenatkriveno parkirno mjesto. REŽIJE: nisu uključene u cijenu najma i plaćaju se dodatno. U prosjeku = 300 EUR / mjesec. UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 2 mjesečne najamnine AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV ----------------------------------------------------------------- The Zagreb4U agency presents a two-story house (235 m2) with a garden (780 m2) in Sesvete. The house has two separate apartments on two floors. The entrances to the apartments are separate and are entered through a common haustor and staircase. VIRTUAL WALK: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/3791/ LOCATION: Sesvete is one of the easternmost settlements in Zagreb, located on the border between the city and rural areas. The district stands out for its diversity — from urbanized parts with modern residential buildings and shopping centers to quieter, traditional villages and natural landscapes. Despite the rapid development, Sesvete has retained the charm of a suburban settlement, making it attractive to families, young people and those looking for a quiet yet practical living space. The neighborhood has a developed infrastructure with numerous schools, kindergartens, sports centers and cultural facilities such as the Museum of Prigorje. It is very well connected to the rest of Zagreb, especially by trains and buses, which makes it attractive for people looking for a more affordable living space outside the city center. THE HOUSE CONSISTS OF: - GROUND FLOOR: 4 bedrooms, large living room, dining room, kitchen, small dining room, wardrobe, 2 bathrooms with toilets and showers and one additional toilet, balcony, terrace and exit to the yard - 1st FLOOR: 2 bedrooms, large living room, dining room, kitchen, wardrobe, one bathroom with toilet and bathtub, one additional toilet and a large terrace. Also available: outdoor brick covered barbecue, closed garden storage and open canopy. FURNITURE AND EQUIPMENT: the house is partially furnished, but it can be furnished according to the needs of the tenants. Appliances in it: hob, oven, fridge, dishwasher and washing maschine. THE HOUSE IS INTENDED FOR: companies or agencies for employment of workers. It is also possible to rent to private persons. PARKING: the house comes with an outdoor uncovered parking space. UTILITIES: not included in the rental price and are paid additionally. On average = 300 EUR / month. USUAL CONDITIONS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 2 monthly rents AGENCY FEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
naziv_agencije: Zagreb4U - PREMIUM REAL ESTATE, VISOKA KLASA d.o.o.
